metadata.name: HELP!
metadata.description:
Aerosol on 24 broken iPhones - 2022  
18” x 23” 
Signed & Framed

--

"HELP" An original poem by KAIRO SAGE:

Glowing faces, dark rooms, deep spirals

Pieces of  
nothingness

Miniature moments  
of forgettable

Clocking up,  
collecting,  
following

Loving without love,  
Liking the unlikeable,  
Praising the average

The cart is before the horse,  
Our Wheels stuck in the mud,  
Cracking the whip on futility

I gave my power away  
before breakfast

The sugar of my imagination 
diluted in sour milk

In the game, 
without a whistle,  
A red card on reality

Polarised

Paralysed

Asleep.

attributes.value: This 1:1 NFT is a Phygital drop. Paired with the original 1:1 physical Artwork.
